author: JakeFTL
name: ArmaEvents
description: Posts Arma Reforger server events (joins, kills, FPS drops) to Discord via Server Admin Tools Events API.
install_msg: Thanks for installing ArmaEvents! Use `!load ArmaEvents` to start, then configure with `!arma setchannel`, `!arma settoken`, and `!arma setaddress`. Check `!arma showsettings` to verify!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
